item.title: publications
item.description: A list of my publications is given below, it’s usually fairly up to date. Alternatively, you can take a look at my Google Scholar profile, or my profile on any number of useless “academic profile” websites (listed at the end of the page). {%for author in entry.author_array%} {%assign f_names = author.first | split: ‘ ‘%} {%assign end_count = forloop.length | minus:1%} {%for f_name in f_names%}{{f_name | slice: 0 | strip}}.
